nodes.text: Showdown is a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It is the third adventure of the Polarization trilogy and was written by Margaret Heintz and edited by Ron Heintz.
For the first time in weeks the city is quiet. The violence of Riboga's crime war, so soon on the heels of the Thaereian Conflict, has paused. An uneasy truce of which only a few are aware.
